title: IoT Engineer, Lab Manager
keyPoints: IoT Fullstack applications: smartwatch with fullstack app, smart mask with frontend, Wifi monitoring device with fullstack app, Management tool for IoT device on cloud
Setting-up of an electronic laboratory for the computer science division (ICT)

title: Embedded Systems Engineer
location: LORIA (INRIA, CNRS, Université de Lorraine), Nancy, France
keyPoints: Design and implementation of a rodent brain implant device (hardware, firmware and GUI) that would allow our team to record the neural signal of a rodent (mouse, rat) during a set of experimentation
Optimization of a FBAR compression algorithm to acquire a higher number of neural channels (points of acquisition in the brain)
Design and implementation of a bluetooth acquisition device for neuromuscular signal of living moth.

title: Internship Loria/ESSTIN
location: LORIA (INRIA, CNRS, Université de Lorraine), Nancy, France
keyPoints: Development of an acquisition system for moths electrophysiological signals
Feasibility study of the implementation of a cable robot which would follow a moth in-flight and record electrophysiological data.

title: MS. in Embedded Systems
keyPoints: Dual master degree in Embedded Systems & Microsystems engineering
Topics: computer architecture, hardware implementation, firmware design

title: MS. in System Control (Diplôme d'Ingénieur)

title: ERASMUS international student exchange program
